description: |-
  Validate that a string matches one of the allowed values.
---

# function: in_list

Returns true when the input string equals one of the supplied allowed values.

## Example Usage

```terraform
locals {
  allowed_colors = ["red", "green", "blue"]

  color_checks = [
    {
      value       = "green"
      ignore_case = false
      valid       = provider::validatefx::in_list("green", local.allowed_colors, false, null)
    },
    {
      value       = "Green"
      ignore_case = true
      valid       = provider::validatefx::in_list("Green", local.allowed_colors, true, null)
    },
    {
      value       = "purple"
      ignore_case = false
      valid       = provider::validatefx::in_list("purple", local.allowed_colors, false, "Unsupported color; choose one of: ${join(", ", local.allowed_colors)}")
    }
  ]
}

output "validatefx_in_list" {
  value = local.color_checks
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
in_list(value string, allowed list of string, ignore_case bool, message string) bool
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `value` (String, Nullable) String value to validate.
1. `allowed` (List of String) List of allowed string values.
1. `ignore_case` (Boolean, Nullable) Whether comparisons are case-insensitive.
1. `message` (String, Nullable) Optional custom diagnostic message to surface on validation failure.
